METS:xmlData.dc:title: Neobjavljeno Zwittrovo poročilo o poti po Koroškem poleti 1930
METS:xmlData.dc:creator: Stergar, Janez
METS:xmlData.dc:description: Slovenski zgodovinar Fran Zwitter (1905-1988) je bil po študiju na ljubljanski in dunajski univerzi (ter pred odhodom na postdoktorski študij v Pariz) 1. 10. 1929 - 30. 9. 1930 pogodbeni asistent na geografskem inštitutu ljubljanske Filozofske fakultete. 17. - 29. 8. 1930 je peš potoval po južnem Koroškem ter o svojih opažanjih in pogovorih pripravil 13 strani dolgo poročilo. To ni turistični potopis, ampak analiza jezikovnega, šolskega, cerkvenega, gospodarsko-socialnega in političnega položaja koroških Slovencev kot manjšinske skupnosti (iz katere je izhajal tudi Zwittrov oče). Avtorstvo anonimnega poročila je pred dvema desetletjema razkril sam Zwitter. Poročilo, ki je v integralni obliki objavljeno v tem zborniku, je shranjeno v arhivu Inštituta za narodnostna vprašanja v Ljubljani, kar potrjuje dejstvo, da e bilo potovanje opravljeno s pomočjo tedanjega Manjšinskega inštituta in Kluba koroških Slovencev v Ljubljani. Redakcijski komentar objave vsebuje tudi primerjavo s Zwittrovo knjigo »Koroško vprašanje« (1937).

After his study in Ljubljana and Vienna, and before his post-doctoral study in Paris, Fran Zwitter (Slovenian historian, 1905-1988) worked as an assistant at the Institute of Geography at the Faculty of Arts in Ljubljana (October 1, 1929 - September 30, 1930). On August 17, 1930 he set on a thirteen-day walking tour through southern Carinthia in Austria. Upon his retum to Ljubljana he wrote a thirteen-page report about this trip that is far more than a mere journal recording his observations and conversations with the local population. The report is an analysis of linguistic, economic, social, educational, religious, and politicai situation of Carinthian Slovenes as a minority group (a member of which was also Zwitter’s father). Two decades ago, Fran Zwitter revealed that he was the author of this hitherto anonymous report. The report, published in its original form in this publication, is kept at the Institute for Ethnie Studies in Ljubljana, which indicates that Zwitter’s trip had been organized with the help of former Institute for Minorities and with Carinthian Slovenes Club in Ljubljana. An éditorial commentary on this report contains a comparison with Zwitter’s book, Koroško vprašanje (The Carinthian Question, 1937).
METS:xmlData.dc:subject: Fran Zwitter
koroški Slovenci
narodne manjšine
Fran Zwitter
Carinthian Slovenes
national minorities
METS:xmlData.dc:publisher: Zveza zgodovinskih društev Slovenije: Oddelek za zgodovino, Filozofska fakulteta
METS:xmlData.dcterms:alternative: Fran Zwitter’s Unpublished Report of His Trip through Austrian Carinthia in the Summer of 1930
